name: Super Brick Break Tournament
description: Original comment:  'Ended up scraping several ideas and making this whole thing mostly on the last day.... sorry, couldn't code a lose condition in time.'.  Made for the One Minute Game Jam #4 (72 hours).  Made in Vanilla JS, original code, art & music by me.
instructions: Release <kbd>Click1</kbd> to attack towards the mouse direction.  Not hitting anything will result in a longer animation time, while hitting a brick will istantly cancel the animation.
